home.heroTitle: Pioneering the Future of DevOps with AI-Powered Automation
home.heroSubtitle: We're transforming how teams deploy, manage, and scale their applications with intelligent infrastructure automation that learns and adapts to your needs.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Manage and deploy your applications
projects.noProjectsDesc: Get started by creating your first project. Connect your repository and let OmniInfra handle the rest.

features.aiPoweredDesc: Intelligent automation that learns from your deployment patterns and optimizes your infrastructure automatically.
features.instantDeployDesc: Deploy your applications in seconds with our lightning-fast deployment pipeline and global CDN.
features.autoScalingDesc: Automatic scaling based on traffic patterns and resource usage with predictive analytics.
features.securityFirstDesc: Built-in security scanning, compliance monitoring, and automated vulnerability management.
features.monitoringDesc: Comprehensive monitoring and alerting with custom dashboards and intelligent anomaly detection.
features.collaborationDesc: Seamless team workflows with role-based access control and integrated communication tools.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Get from code to production in three simple steps
howItWorks.step1Desc: Link your GitHub, GitLab, or Bitbucket repository in seconds
howItWorks.step2Desc: Our AI analyzes your code and automatically configures the optimal deployment pipeline
howItWorks.step3Desc: Deploy instantly and let our intelligent scaling handle traffic spikes automatically

testimonials.title: What Our Users Say
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of developers who trust OmniInfra
testimonials.testimonial1: OmniInfra transformed our deployment process. What used to take hours now takes minutes, and the AI-powered optimizations have reduced our infrastructure costs by 40%.
testimonials.testimonial2: The automatic scaling saved us during our product launch. We went from 1K to 100K users overnight, and OmniInfra handled it seamlessly without any manual intervention.
testimonials.testimonial3: Finally, a DevOps platform that actually understands our needs. The AI suggestions are spot-on, and the security features give us peace of mind.

finalCta.title: Ready to Transform Your DevOps?
finalCta.subtitle: Join thousands of developers already using OmniInfra to deploy faster and scale smarter

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
contact.name: Name
contact.subject: Subject

about.title: About OmniInfra
about.subtitle: Pioneering the future of intelligent DevOps automation
about.missionText: To democratize world-class DevOps practices through AI-powered automation, making it possible for any team to deploy, scale, and manage applications with enterprise-grade reliability.
about.storyText: Founded in 2023 by a team of former Google and Amazon engineers, OmniInfra was born from the frustration of managing complex deployment pipelines. We envisioned a world where intelligent automation handles the heavy lifting, allowing developers to focus on what they do best: building amazing products.
about.teamText: We're a diverse team of engineers, designers, and DevOps experts united by our passion for making development workflows more efficient and enjoyable.
